page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][AI & Machine Learning] - Llama incident notification
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Our technical team continues to work on a fix causing latency on Llama3.3-70B. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
